body: The TFE_Op has no destructor because we have a C API, but inside the C API we can use all of C++ and avoid risking memory bugs with future edits to this code. Please make it a unique_ptr.
body_html: The TFE_Op has no destructor because we have a C API, but inside the C API we can use all of C++ and avoid risking memory bugs with future edits to this code. Please make it a unique_ptr.
